name: Trapdoor Ep 1 Lost and found
description:
My twins asked me to make a game of a show we all love so I made this 

A Fanmade Point + Click Small Adventure 

The Trapdoor_Ep1 Lost and Found

Say hello to Berk and friends

Game Based on the show by CMTB Animation and Queensgate Productions Ltd 

The show was created by British animators Terry Brain and Charlie Mills.
